title: Smart Data Models - HydroGeneratingUnit
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A generating unit whose prime mover is a hydraulic turbine (e.g., Francis, Pelton, Kaplan).

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be HydroGeneratingUnit

HydroPowerPlant.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The hydro generating unit belongs to a hydro power plant. Default: None

energyConversionCapability.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Energy conversion capability for generating. Default: None
